title: Amending the Constitution formally and informally

content.question: The United States Constitution has endured for more than two centuries as the framework of government. However, the meaning of the Constitution has been changed both by formal and informal methods.Identify two formal methods for adding amendments to the Constitution.Describe two informal methods that have been used to change the meaning of the Constitution. Provide one specific example for each informal method you described.Explain why informal methods are used more often than the formal amendment process.
